63#define AM_HAL_STIMER_COMPARE_OFFSET (&STIMER->SCMPR1 - &STIMER->SCMPR0)
64#define AM_REG_STIMER_COMPARE(n, r) ((&STIMER->SCMPR0) + \
65 (r * AM_HAL_STIMER_COMPARE_OFFSET))
66
68#define AM_HAL_STIMER_CAPTURE_OFFSET (&STIMER->SCAPT1 - &STIMER->SCAPT0)
69#define AM_REG_STIMER_CAPTURE(n, r) ((&STIMER->SCAPT0) + \
70 (r * AM_HAL_STIMER_CAPTURE_OFFSET))
71
73#define AM_HAL_STIMER_NVRAM_OFFSET (&STIMER->SNVR1 - &STIMER->SNVR0)
74#define AM_REG_STIMER_NVRAM(n, r) ((&STIMER->SNVR0) + \
75 (r * AM_HAL_STIMER_NVRAM_OFFSET))
